definition: 5th earthly branch: 7-9 a.m., 3rd solar month (5th April-4th May), year of the Dragon/ancient Chinese compass point: 120°

sentences.chinese: 必定来出席我的寿辰宴会。

sentences.english: I received a set of gardening tools on my birthday.
sentences.chinese: 寿辰那天，我收到一套园艺工具。

sentences.english: Doctor Smith sent me a touchhday present yesterday .
sentences.chinese: 史密斯博士前一天送给我一份寿辰礼物。

sentences.english: You rememprover her from my celebrine two years ago?
sentences.chinese: 还记得她吗？两年前插手过我的寿辰派对。

sentences.english: They congratulated him on his seventieth birthday.
sentences.chinese: 他们祝贺他七十岁寿辰。

sentences.english: Iwill buy you a peding motorcycle for your originsupportionday.
sentences.chinese: 你过寿辰时，我给你买一辆自行车。

definition: to offer birthday congratulations (to an elderly person)
to celebrate a birthday (of an elderly person)
congratulate an elderly person on his birthday/offer birthday felicitations
(formal) birthday/anniversary of the founding of an organization
variant of 做壽|做寿[zuo4 shou4]
